Title: A joint statement from Microsoft and OpenAI
Description: The post [A joint statement from Microsoft and OpenAI](https://blogs.microsoft.com/blog/2025/09/11/a-joint-statement-from-microsoft-and-openai/) appeared first on [Source](https://news.microsoft.com/source).
Author: stclarke
EnhancedContent:
![OpenAI and Microsoft logos](https://blogs.microsoft.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/PNG-openai-microsoft_960x540.png)

Microsoft and OpenAI have signed a non-binding memorandum of understanding (MOU) for the next phase of our partnership. We are actively working to finalize contractual terms in a definitive agreement. Together, we remain focused on delivering the best AI tools for everyone, grounded in our shared commitment to safety.

Tags: [AI](https://blogs.microsoft.com/blog/tag/ai/)
